content: Compose a limerick where each line begins with a different vowel, in order.

A funny limerick, you seek,
Each line with a vowel to speak,
Starting from A to U,
In order, I'll ensue,
So here's one I did recently tweak.

A young man from Bahrain,
Obsessed with his hair in a flair,
In a unique style,
With colors so beguiling,
Every day he'd wear something rare.
